public class WeaponCraftingAction
extends Action
An action that allows an actor to craft weapons

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public java.lang.String execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Allows the crafting weapon action to be executed. Weapon crafting is based on the weapon type.
      Specified by:
      execute in class Action
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor performing the action
      map - the map in which the action is being performed
      Returns:
      the String of the action's description

    • menuDescription

      public java.lang.String menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      A method that returns the description for the menu. Based on what type the weapon is, the appropriate weapon name that will be crafted will be returned.
      Specified by:
      menuDescription in class Action
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor performing the action
      Returns:
      the text we put on the menu
